column5: Cute cozy and comfy, the Lighthouse camper is located on a private saltwater lake with fully equipped kitchen, linens, full bathroom, and all outdoor amenities of CRYSTAL BEACH CABANAS such as chairs, hammocks, tables, boats to check crab traps, firepits, grills, smoker, and much much more! Why pay extra for a large beach house when the Lighthouse has all you could need?
column8: The Lighthouse Fishermans Retreat on Bolivar!
